Name: Spark The Battle Dog
About the game: Spark The Battle Dog, is a Top down Shooter in which you control 'Spark', a military dog specialized in weapons. In the near future, almost all human beings on earth were exposed to a virus that turned them into zombies. Thomas, a boy lost in the forest, appears to be the key to a possible cure for infection. Spark's arduous mission is to protect and escort Thomas to the refuge of the last surviving humans, but a gang of mutant animals, led by King Brutus, a Bull Dog willing to destroy the human race, will do anything to stop him! GAMEPLAY Camp defense: Most enemies will ignore Spark and will focus on attacking the hut where Thomas is hiding. Improve camp defenses and make Spark's job easier. Hitting the road: Spark needs to go out on a motorcycle to collect supplies periodically, but the roads are full of infected people. Shoot, in the best 'terminator' style and make your way. Survival: In this type of stage, Spark is the target! Upgrade your weapons and destroy giant hordes of zombies. FEATURES *72 stages *5 boss battles *Weapon upgrade *Camping upgrade
